articles.description: An extremely rare collection of 160-million-year-old sea spider fossils from Southern France are closely related to living species, unlike older fossils of their kind. These fossils offer vital insights into the evolutionary journey of sea spiders, revealing …
articles.content:
ByUniversity of BristolAugust 20, 2023
